content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an AI response to Google the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail, which returned multiple links. The links included a trail on AllTrails and a hiking route on OutdoorActive. The website provided information on running routes in the area, offering approximately 8 km of decent running with rolling hills, but no loop trail around the entire reservoir. The top end of the reservoir around U Sirky beach is a good area to start, and there is bus access available. I attempted to open the AllTrails link provided, but received an error message stating that the shell command is not allowed.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "brno_reservoir_trip/brno_reservoir_trail_info.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Distance: 5.4 miles\nDuration: 2 hours and 14 minutes\nElevation gain: 285 feet\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "distance = 5.4\\nhours = 2\\nminutes = 14\\n\\ntotal_minutes = hours * 60 + minutes\\ntotal_hours = total_minutes / 60\\nspeed = distance / total_hours\\n\\nprint(f\\"Average speed required to complete the trail in the given duration: {speed:.2f} miles per hour\\")", "name": "calculate_average_speed.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Average speed required to complete the trail in the given duration: 2.42 miles per hour\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.alltrails.com/explore/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian-region/brno-reservoir-loop-trail", "question": "What is the best route to take on the Brno Reservoir Trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize\n\nLinks: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "brno reservoir trail best route"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://greatruns.com/location/brno-czechia/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno/trail-running"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What is the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running routes in the Brno Reservoir area in Czechia. The area offers approximately 8 km of decent running with rolling hills, but there is no loop trail around the entire reservoir. The top end of the reservoir around U Sirky beach is a good area to start, and there is bus access available. The text does not provide information on the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail.\n\nLinks: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "brno reservoir trail distance and elevation gain"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno/trail-running", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brno", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno/forest", "https://www.sportdistancecalculator.com/index.php?id=15082", "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/czech-republic/south-moravian/brno", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/this-is-brno-and-its-surroundings-by-bike.pdf"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "xdg-open https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: Error: This Shell Command is not allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{}', type='ai_response')]
"""
